description:
Combining Experience And Passion In The Pursuit Of Justice

Hall Law P.A. has an extensive history of excellence and success representing Minnesota residents victimized by negligent and abusive actions. The personal injury attorneys at our law firm possess decades of experience combined with a passion for justice. For ordinary people injured in accidents caused by an inattentive driver or a defective product, the best form of justice is compensation for their losses.

While "David" may have defeated the larger "Goliath," fighting insurance companies is a different type of battle. We have found that their power and influence have only grown stronger over time. Facing off against powerful opposition should not be done without the help of a skilled and seasoned personal injury lawyer.

Overcoming The Odds For Fellow Members Of The Edina Community

Both the legal community and the insurance industry are well aware of our success in securing record-setting verdicts and settlements. Our attorneys continually adapt to the changes in the law and the "power struggle" with opponents who would deny our clients justice.

Simply stated, we strive to do right by wronged Minnesotans who are out of work or grieving the death of a loved one. Regardless of the size of the personal injury claim or the defendant, we stand up for ordinary citizens whose only goal is to be treated fairly.

Caring, Convenience And Accessibility For Our Clients

Our clients' goals are our goals. From pursuing compensation for the damage done to them to keeping the streets of Edina safe for families, we strive to send a strong message to those who do not share our goals.

Hall Law P.A. is open from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday through Friday. Our attorneys will meet with Edina residents on evenings and weekends by appointment. Free parking is also available.
